data.name: Extinction
data.detailed_description:
Description

Extinction is a short but immersive singleplayer horror game where you play as a young traveler who is exploring an abandoned valley called "The valley of Extinction. Your role is to explore different places in the valley of Extinction such as a deep, dark forest and an old basement. In these places you will find different possessed monsters who want to kill you. Trying to survive will soon be in your best interest...

Content

Extinction contains a linear singleplayer horror experience, in which you will solve different puzzles, explore different, haunted places and most importantly try to survive.

(USE HEADPHONES FOR BEST EXPERIENCE)
(Warning : Game contains some gore.)

If you are having trouble with the install then you probably need to download visual c++ redistributable, you can do that in this link https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads-2647da03-1eea-4433-9aff-95f26a218cc0

IMPORTANT : if game is not working properly when started then you need to wait untill it loads and dont click on it as it may cause it to crash, if movement is unresponsive then press "escape" button and click on continue.

data.short_description: Extinction is a singleplayer horror game where you explore The valley of Extinction. Your job is to explore it while also keeping yourself alive from monsters who want to end your life.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Graphics: GTX 1080

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some gore but only at one point later in the game. However no explicit sexual content nor any drug related content is present.
